doc:
Terry Kiser https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terry_Kiser 0 Terry Kiser (born August 1, 1939) is an American actor. He is known for portraying the deceased title character of the comedy Weekend at Bernie's and its sequel, Weekend at Bernie's II. He has more than 140 acting credits to his name, with a career spanning more than 53 years. He is the co-founder of an acting school in Austin, Texas, "The Actors Arena". Terry_Kiser ( born August_1_,_1939 ) is an_American_actor . He is_known for portraying the_deceased_title_character of the_comedy Weekend at Bernie 's and its_sequel , Weekend at Bernie 's_II . He has more_than_140_acting_credits to his_name , with a_career spanning more_than_53_years . He is the_co-founder of an_acting_school in Austin , Texas , " The_Actors_Arena_" .
